alert.note: Alert for Atkinson; Clinch (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 06 at 5:22PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Atkinson and northwestern Clinch Counties through 600 PM EDT... At 522 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of producing a landspout 10 miles northeast of Lakeland, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts and winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of south central Atkinson and northwestern Clinch Counties. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM EDT for southeastern Georgia.
